about_the_game:
[h1]THE DEFINITIVE MOMENT OF THE MONSTROUS FIGHTS HAS ARRIVED [/h1]

We already have a demo available for all players


From Ethereal's Flow Entertainment we bring you this demo, so that everyone can play Monster Fighter with your friends and family.
The demo contains:


- Another Tokyo
- Icecream World


- Creamball
- Beheicecream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: medium
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ultra
